name: python-vobject
short_description: vobject is intended to be a full featured Python package for parsing and generating vCard and vCalendar files. Originally developed in concert with the Open Source Application Foundation's Chandler project.  Currently, iCalendar files are supported and well tested. vCard 3.0 files are supported, and all data should be imported, but only a few components are understood in a sophisticated way.
summary: Full featured Python package for parsing and generating vCard and vCal
